sections.title: External links

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Applicable because gene symbols should be italicized.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The gene symbol ATF1 appears without italics in the UCSC gene info link.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The section does not adhere to the requirement as the gene symbol is not italicized.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Section headings and formatting should be consistent throughout the article.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section title 'External links' follows the same style as other section headers.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Strong adherence to consistent formatting requirements for section headers.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: Consistent with the style of other sections.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Use of bullet points for the list in the 'External links' section.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section uses bullet points for listing external links appropriately.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Complete adherence as bullet points are used where needed, improving readability.

sections.meta_notes: The section properly uses bullet points for listing external links but needs improvement with italicizing gene symbols. Header formatting is consistent with the rest of the article.
